I think the ship's underwarer.

::Havoc/Repressor/Zardus::

Havoc swims to about a dozen yards away from the ship, looking at it, 
and noticing a Maximal nearby.

"WarMachines, come to me, there might be some battle soon," he says 
over his comm-link, looking at the Maximal.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Repressor frowns, recieving Havoc's message.

"Zardus," he says into his comm, "I have to go help Havoc, the femm 
is in the docking bay, guarded by Najah."

"Stay herre," he says to Najah and Lady Hawk, running out of the room 
and for the exit. Zardus comes in in several seconds.

"I see that you have arrived," he says simply, walking toward Lady 
Hawk.
